description: Poor Koby has been left naked and hanging by plastic in the dungeon, it's stronger than it looks and he just can't break free. It's a good thing too, because kinky Sean has a new toy he wants to try out. The electrodes around his helmet and shaft are soon doing their magic as Sean pleasures that cock and gets his captive spewing hot milky cream!
title: Koby Lewis & Sean Taylor
